snippet: Revenue for the third-quarter at Coke, the world’s largest soft drink company, declined 3 percent but the company expects its sales in emerging markets to grow.
lead_paragraph: Revenue for the third-quarter at Coke, the world’s largest soft drink company, declined 3 percent but the company expects its sales in emerging markets to grow.

headline.main: Coca-Cola’s Net Income Rises Despite a Drop in Revenue
headline.print_headline: Coca-Cola’s Net Income Rises Despite a Drop in Revenue
